abstract: Columbia men's basketball coach Kyle Smith is hired to coach at University of San Francisco; other men's college basketball news noted.
snippet: A day after leading Columbia to its first postseason men’s basketball title, in the CollegeInsider.com tournament, Kyle Smith, 46, was hired as the coach at the University of San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: A day after leading Columbia to its first postseason men’s basketball title, in the CollegeInsider.com tournament, Kyle Smith, 46, was hired as the coach at the University of San Francisco.
